Property.name: enable
Property.HelpText: If the shadows should be visible at all.

Property.name: equipment
Property.HelpText: If upgrade shadows should be visible.

Property.name: resolution
Property.HelpText: Changes the resolution of the shadow texture used, higher values lead to less pixelated shadows at the cost of memory and performance - lower values the opposite.

Property.name: opacity
Property.HelpText: Changes the darkness/opacity of the shadows. While Dreamcast's opacity can be fully recreated, GameCube's opacity sadly can't be due to blending differences - so an aproximation is used instead.
